name: "Sly Cooper" - Spell It Out 2 (PS2) Multiple Choice Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Once you have completed the first nine questions, the first letter of each of the answers will spell out the final answer.  Have fun and good luck!

Who is the main enemy of Sly throughout the entire trilogy?
questions.explanation:
Carmelita Fox.

	Carmelita Fox is the main enemy of Sly throughout all games, and she wants to catch Sly if it is the last thing she does.  Sly has a huge crush on her, and at the end of the three games, they end up together.

questions.text: What kind of music does Octavio sing?
questions.explanation:
Opera.

	Octavio is an opera singing dog.  He doesn't like how rock n' roll entered the scene and took away his opera singing career, just as he was getting good.  He pumps tar into the canals of Venice to get back at the world.

questions.text: Where do you fight the Black Baron?
questions.explanation:
None of these.

	You only fight Black Baron once, on the tip of a huge plane.  The Black Baron cheats, and once you defeat his plane in the Ace Finals, a larger plane comes below him and he drops on.  He claims it isn't cheating, because the competition is supposed to be of lasting in the air, not in your plane.  Sly finally beats him, and he turns out to be Penelope!

questions.text: Which of the following animals has the Guru never ridden?
questions.explanation:
Snake.

	The Guru can take over any enemy, along with wolves and sharks.  You are required to take control of dingoes in "Rumble Down Under", the wolf in "Flight of Fancy", and sharks in the final level.  Pigs are also found in "Flight of Fancy", and Guru can take control of them.  He cannot, however, take control of snakes.

questions.text: How many sharks does the Guru take over?
questions.explanation:
Ten.

	In the final level with Dr. M, in order to retrieve Sly's cane, the Guru must take ten sharks over using Dream Time.  He is the only member of the gang without metal, so he is the one to destroy the giant magnetic platform.  He uses sharks to do so.  He takes control of shark after shark, having the other sharks he already has taken over follow him, and he has them furiously attack the platform until it is destroyed.

questions.text: Which of these places has the gang visited?
questions.explanation:
All of these.

	When fighting Octavio, you are in the Grand Canals of Venice.  You see the Eiffel Tower a few times, although you never actually get near it.  You see it in the level with Dimitri.  Uluru is another name for Ayers Rock, which you visit during the level in Australia.  You must drive the miners out of Ayers Rock.

Blimp.

	The final level of "Sly 2" is completed on Arpeggio's blimp.  You stow away on it without his knowledge, so you can defeat him and his evil plans.  You never do fight him, though.  He dies in the level.

questions.text: Who is the main enemy of "Blood Bath Bay"?
questions.explanation:
LeFwee.

	LeFwee is the main enemy in this level.  He is a mean pirate who has captured Penelope.  You must get Bentley's love back for him in this level!

questions.text: Where do you hide to listen to Dr. M's conversation the first time when he kills his helper?
questions.explanation:
Elevator.

	You hide on top of the elevator, where you can get a good view of him and be able to listen to him.  He poisoned his helper at lunch, so he died.  He gave absolutely no thought to this poor elephant's wife and kids, and simply told the janitor to clean up the mess.

questions.text:
Ok, now take the first letter of the first nine answers to spell out the name of a title of a character!
Who is the answer?
questions.explanation:
Constable.

	Constable Neyla is Carmelita's helper during the second game.  She acts as though she is on Carmelita's side, but is really on Sly's side.  However, she is on neither one of the sides, and tries to become Clockwerk herself, naming herself Clockla.
